page.title: 09EYE BYPASS 1
page.content: THE BYPASS There is a dispute in{Eye}over the bypass that is going to be built . There are two proposed routes, the North and the South. The Government wants it to go North because there are already foundations laid from the old dismantled railway track. People in {Eye }who have dogs take them down the railway track and clay pits for exercise. If it goes North thay will be cut off from the railway track and clay pits. These are the arguments : The shop owners in{Eye}don't want the by pass to be made anywhere because they will lose money from the cars, vans and lorries that usually stop at their shops. The farmers don't want the bypass to go the southern route because it will go through good farm land and they mightnlose money.
